item.title: 巴德·巴尼超级碗造型引发Zara T恤3.5万美元天价挂牌
item.description: Zara T恤——类似流行歌手Bad Bunny在超级碗上穿的那款——在转售平台上现身，标价高达数千欧元。就在数小时前，这些服装才刚分发给全球最大时尚零售商的员工。【原文：Zara T-shirts like the one worn by pop star Bad Bunny during the Super Bowl have surfaced on resale platforms with asking prices in the thousands of euros, hours after the garments were distributed to staff at the world’s largest fashion retailer.】

item.title: PayPal面临十字路口，再度聘请新CEO力图扭转局面
item.description: PayPal控股公司作为数字支付领域的先行者，如今却陷入了难以自拔的困境。【原文：PayPal Holdings Inc., an early mover in the world of digital payments, now finds itself in a rut it can’t seem to get out of.】

item.title: 债权人准备就委内瑞拉600亿美元债务展开谈判，此前马杜罗被捕
item.description: 据知情人士透露，持有委内瑞拉债券的一批国际投资者已选定霍利汉·洛基担任其财务顾问，这是他们为大规模债务重组做准备的关键一步。【原文：A group of international investors holding Venezuelan bonds chose Houlihan Lokey as its financial adviser, according to people familiar with the matter, a key step as they gear up for a massive debt restructuring.】

item.title: 福克斯收购播客订阅工具以强化其数字内容创作者平台
item.description:
福克斯旗下Red Seat Ventures部门正收购Supercast公司，该平台为《Huberman Lab》和《This American Life》等播客提供订阅服务。【原文：

Fox’s Red Seat Ventures arm is acquiring Supercast, which powers subscriptions for podcasts like Huberman Lab and This American Life

】

item.title: 美国消费者拖欠率跃升至近十年最高水平
item.description: 从抵押贷款到信用卡贷款的违约率在第四季度升至美国家庭未偿债务总额的4.8%，创2017年以来最高水平，这主要源于低收入群体和年轻借款人的违约率上升。【原文：Delinquency rates on loans ranging from mortgages to credit cards rose to 4.8% of all outstanding US household debt in the fourth quarter, the highest level since 2017, driven by higher defaults among low-income and young borrowers.】

item.title: 斯塔默的竞争对手伯纳姆称其关于国债市场的言论遭误解
item.description: 大曼彻斯特市长、工党领袖基尔·斯塔默的潜在挑战者安迪·伯纳姆表示，去年他关于英国“深陷债券市场债务泥潭”的言论被断章取义，并坚称其国家愿景将使英国成为“更具投资吸引力的国家”。【原文：Andy Burnham, the mayor of Greater Manchester and potential leadership challenger to Keir Starmer, said his comments last year that Britain was “in hock” to the bond markets were taken out of context, and insisted his vision for the country would make it “a more investible proposition.”】

item.description: 松弛与紧绷同时发生。【原文：Slackening and tightening at the same time.】

item.title: 塞内加尔石油公司计划斥资1亿美元开展本土陆上石油勘探
item.description: 塞内加尔国有石油公司佩特罗森计划今年斥资1亿美元开展自主勘探活动，以发掘陆上油田的原油资源。【原文：Petrosen, Senegal’s state-owned oil company, plans to conduct its own $100-million exploration campaign this year to discover crude in onshore fields.】

item.title: 万豪股价因品牌信用卡手续费上涨而飙升
item.description: 万豪国际集团股价飙升，此前该公司表示，由于向品牌合作伙伴收取的特许权使用费率提高，预计信用卡手续费将增长。【原文：Marriott International Inc. shares surged after the company said it expects credit card fees to grow thanks to an increase in the royalty rate it charges branding partners.】

item.title: 魁北克养老基金因爱泼斯坦档案暂停与迪拜环球港务集团交易
item.description: 加拿大第二大养老基金表示，因迪拜公司迪拜环球港务集团首席执行官与失势金融家杰弗里·爱泼斯坦存在关联的指控，该基金将暂停与该集团的未来投资计划。【原文：Canada’s second-largest pension fund says it’s suspending future investment plans with DP World over alleged ties between the Dubai company’s chief executive officer and disgraced financier Jeffrey Epstein.】

item.title: 软银创伤消退，拉吉夫·米斯拉加码私募股权投资
item.description: 拉吉夫·米斯拉曾助力软银集团跻身全球最大科技投资方之列，但因投资失利与内部冲突，其任期提前终结。如今他再度瞄准私营企业股权，试图掀起新一轮投资浪潮。【原文：Rajeev Misra helped transform SoftBank Group Corp. into one of the world’s largest technology backers before his tenure ended amid souring bets and internal clashes. Now he’s once again looking to make a splash by snapping up stakes in private firms.】

item.title: 美国股市日交易额突破万亿美元大关
item.description: 美国股市资金流动量创历史新高，日均交易额突破1万亿美元大关，巨量成交已成为新常态。【原文：US equity markets are moving more money than ever before, blowing past $1 trillion in shares traded each day as heavy volume becomes the new norm.】

item.title: 美国称与印度的贸易协议将包含豆类让步条款
item.description: 白宫发布的简报显示，印度已同意逐步取消包括"某些豆类"和"其他"农产品在内的一系列农产品关税。此举引发反对派批评，指责政府缺乏透明度，并担忧此举将对南亚国家的农民产生影响。【原文：India has agreed to phase out duties on a range of agricultural products including ‘certain pulses’ and ‘additional’ farm products, a White House fact sheet showed, fueling opposition criticism over lack of transparency and impact on farmers in the South Asian nation.】

item.title: 银行为CVC收购史密斯公司业务单元筹备12亿英镑债务融资方案
item.description: 银行正准备出售一笔巨额债务融资，用于支持史密斯集团旗下生产机场安检扫描仪的业务部门剥离。随着并购活动回暖，这笔最新收购融资即将登陆市场。【原文：Banks are preparing to sell a jumbo debt financing backing the carveout of a unit of Smiths Group Plc that makes airport security scanners, the latest buyout financing set to come to market in a pick up of M&A activity.】

item.title: 英国电网运营商称数据中心可能推高能源价格
item.description: 英国电网运营商负责人周二表示，选址不当或缺乏灵活需求选项的大型数据中心可能推高能源成本。【原文：Large-scale data centers located in the wrong place or without flexible demand options could hike energy costs, the head of the UK’s grid operator said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 瑞银策略师建议做空欧洲垃圾级零售商
item.description: 瑞银集团信用策略师建议投资者做空欧洲垃圾级零售企业的债券，称这些债券交易价格过高，且缺乏宏观经济环境的支持。【原文：UBS Group AG credit strategists suggest investors short the bonds of European junk-rated retail names, saying they trade at expensive levels that aren’t supported by broader economic conditions.】

item.title: 世界银行国际金融公司承诺为跨国企业进军印度市场提供资金支持
item.description: 世界银行投资部门将协助全球投资者设立专注于印度市场的基金，同时加大对印度私募股权领域的资本承诺。国际金融公司南亚基金集团区域负责人尼哈·格罗弗如是说。【原文：World Bank’s investment arm will help global investors set up India-focused funds, as it increases capital commitments in the country’s private equity space, said Neha Grover, regional lead for South Asia Funds Group at the International Finance Corp.】

item.title: Meta在青少年成瘾诉讼前投放数千条电视广告
item.description: Instagram母公司Meta Platforms Inc.已斥资投放数千条电视广告，宣传其针对青少年的安全措施。此举正值该公司面临一场具有里程碑意义的陪审团审判——该审判将审查该公司是否蓄意设计产品，使青少年沉迷社交媒体。【原文：Instagram owner Meta Platforms Inc. has paid for thousands of television commercials to promote its safety work with teens ahead of a landmark jury trial that will examine whether the company builds products deliberately to get kids addicted to social media.】

item.title: 迪士尼启动2020年以来首次投资级债券发售
item.description: 华特迪士尼公司自2020年以来首次发行高评级美元债券，加入企业争相锁定较低融资成本的创纪录热潮。【原文：Walt Disney Co. is offering high-grade dollar bonds for the first time since 2020, joining a record rush of activity as firms lock on in reduced borrowing premiums.】

item.title: 美国股市停滞不前，投资者消化疲软的零售销售数据
item.description: 周二美国股市表现平淡，投资者正密切关注本周即将发布的数项关键经济数据中的首项，试图从中寻找美联储利率路径的线索。【原文：US stocks were muted on Tuesday as investors examined the first of several key economic data releases this week in an attempt to find clues on the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate path.】

item.title: 人工智能公司Multiverse据称在获得新资金后估值达15亿欧元
item.description: 据知情人士透露，西班牙人工智能软件公司Multiverse Computing SL正就筹集约5亿欧元（5.95亿美元）的新一轮融资进行磋商。【原文：Multiverse Computing SL, a Spanish artificial intelligence software company, is in discussions to raise about €500 million ($595 million) in fresh funding, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 詹妮弗·加纳的零食公司Bob's Showcase消费类IPO需求
item.description: 鲍勃折扣家具公司与童话农场PBC公司成功化解了动荡经济环境带来的担忧，为寻求首次公开募股的消费类企业带来了利好消息。【原文：Bob’s Discount Furniture Inc. and Once Upon a Farm PBC shook off concerns surrounding a choppy economic backdrop to deliver good news for consumer-focused companies seeking initial public offerings.】

item.title: 道富银行的费里奇预测美联储三次降息将导致美元贬值10%
item.description: 据道富集团分析师李·费里奇表示，美元今年可能下跌10%，因为存在美联储在新任主席上任后降息幅度可能超出市场预期的风险。【原文：The dollar may fall 10% this year as there’s a risk the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates more deeply than markets anticipate once the next chair of the central bank takes over, according to State Street Corp.’s Lee Ferridge.】

item.title: 肯尼亚连续第十次降息，通胀率持续低迷
item.description: 肯尼亚央行连续第十次下调基准利率，以刺激经济增长，同时通胀率仍处于目标区间内。【原文：Kenya’s central bank cut its benchmark interest rate for the 10th time in a row to spur economic growth as inflation remains within its target band.】

item.title: 内比乌斯同意以2.75亿美元收购人工智能代理搜索公司Tavily
item.description: 云计算服务商Nebius集团同意收购Tavily公司。Tavily是一家软件开发商，其产品能协助人工智能代理搜索编程和金融交易等任务所需的实时信息。【原文：Cloud computing provider Nebius Group NV agreed to acquire Tavily, a maker of software that helps artificial intelligence agents search for up-to-date information needed for tasks like coding and financial trading.】

item.title: 人工智能视频初创公司Runway获新一轮融资，估值达53亿美元
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Runway AI公司已完成新一轮融资，公司估值跃升至53亿美元。投资者正押注于日益逼真的人工智能视频技术，该技术可应用于电影、广告及其他项目。【原文：Runway AI Inc. has clinched a new round of funding that vaults its valuation to $5.3 billion, according to a person familiar with the deal, as investors bet on increasingly lifelike artificial intelligence video technology for films, commercials and other projects.】

item.title: 南非经济十年最佳，标准银行称
item.description: 据非洲资产规模最大的银行一位经济学家称，南非经济已进入十年来最强劲阶段，若其解决基础设施积压问题的努力取得进展，经济增长有望加速。【原文：South Africa’s economy has entered its strongest phase in 10 years and could see growth accelerate if efforts to clear its infrastructure backlog gain traction, according to an economist at the continent’s largest bank by assets.】
